dcterms:description: The Voice Conversion Challenge 2020 datasets include recordings from multiple speakers in different languages, aimed at evaluating voice conversion techniques.
dcterms:title: Voice Conversion Challenge 2020

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: J.S. Chung
A. Nagrani
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: VoxCeleb2 is a large-scale speaker recognition dataset that contains thousands of speakers and is used for training and evaluating speaker recognition systems.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb2

dcterms:creator: H. Zen
V. Dang
R. Clark
Y. Zhang
R.J. Weiss
Y. Jia
Z. Chen
Y. Wu
dcterms:description: LibriTTS is a corpus derived from LibriSpeech for text-to-speech synthesis, providing high-quality speech data for TTS systems.
dcterms:title: LibriTTS

dcterms:creator: V. Christophe
Y. Junichi
M. Kirsten
dcterms:description: The VCTK corpus is an English multi-speaker corpus designed for voice cloning and speech synthesis tasks.
dcterms:title: VCTK
